refnamediv.refpurpose: Name of the script(s) to use in the generated HTML

refsection.para: The html.script parameter is either empty (default), indicating that no script element should be generated in the html output, or it is a list of one or more script locations.

Multiple script locations are space-delimited. If you need to reference a script URI that includes a space, encode it with %20. A separate html script element will be generated for each script in the order they are listed in the parameter.
